modName: Fushia Hood for Cute and Colorful Armor
descriptionHtml:
Notice
======
I\'ve made this hood to go with IcePinguin Cute and Colorful armor.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5989
It replace studded leather helmet, using necromancer hood, idea taken from rahman530 in it\'s nice Rangers Armor Replacer
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3994

The hood was retextured with a stretch of leather and recouloured. Some falmer runes have been added.


Installation
=========
Recommended with NMM
or extract to your skyrim folder

Desinstal
========
remove helmet, helmet_0 and helmet_1 from Data/Meshes/Armor/studded/female
remove hood and hood_n from Data/textures/Armor/studded/m

Issue
====
As I know, there\'s a clipping issue beetween the collar of the armor and the hood.

thanks
======
To IcePinguin for its Cute and Colorful Armor 
To Rahman 530 for the idea of the hood
To the community for their versions of Triss armor

Permissions
==========
you can do anything you want with this, just mention SkyrimNexus if uploaded on other places.
If you like it and use it I highly appreciate a screenshot
author: Silmhiril
